Verses: 1 yobu Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 aam, Neengale Gnaanamulla Janangal; Ungaludane Gnaanam Saagum.
3 ungalaippola Enakkum Buththiyundu; Ungalilum Naan Thaazhndhavan Alla; Ippadippattavaigalai Ariyaadhavan Yaar?
4 en Snegidharaal Naan Nindhikkappattu, Dhevanai Nokkip Praarththippen; Avar Enakku Maru Uththaravu Aruluvaar; Uththamanaagiya Needhimaan Pariyaasampannappadugiraan.
5 aabaththukkullaanavan Sugamaayirukkiravanudaiya Ninaivil Igazhchchiyadaigiraan; Kaalidarinavargalukku Idhu Neridum.
6 kallarudaiya Koodaarangalil Selvamundu; Dhevanaik Kobappaduththugiravargalukku Saangobaangamundu; Avargal Kaiyile Dhevan Konduvandhu Kodukkiraar.
7 ippodhum Nee Mirugangalaik Kettuppaar, Avaigal Unakkup Podhikkum; Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaik Kel. Avaigal Unakku Arivikkum.
8 alladhu Boomiyai Visaariththuk Kel, Adhu Unakku Ubadhesikkum; Samuththiraththin Machchangalaik Kel, Avaigal Unakku Vivarikkum.
9 karththarudaiya Karam Idhai Seydhadhendru Ivaigalellaavatrinaalum Ariyaadhavan Yaar?
10 sagala Praanigalin Jeevanum, Maamsamaana Sagala Manusharin Aaviyum Avar Kaiyilirukkiradhu.
11 vaayaanadhu Pojanaththai Rusipaarkkiradhupola, Seviyaanadhu Vaarththaigalai Sodhiththuppaarkkiradhallavaa?
12 mudhiyoridaththil Gnaanamum Vayadhusendravargalidaththil Buththiyum Irukkume.
13 avaridaththil Gnaanamum Vallamaiyum Eththanai Adhigamaai Irukkum? Avarukkuththaan Aalosanaiyum Buththiyum Undu.
14 idho, Avar Idiththaal Kattamudiyaadhu; Avar Manushanai Adaiththaal Viduvikkamudiyaadhu.
15 idho, Avar Thanneergalai Adakkinaal Ellaam Ularndhupom; Avar Avaigalai Varavittaal, Boomiyaik Keezhadhumeladhaakkum.
16 avaridaththil Belanum Gnaanamumundu; Mosampogiravanum Mosampokkugiravanum, Avar Kaiyin Keezhirukkiraargal.
17 avar Aalosanaikkaararai Siraipidiththu, Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Madhimayakkugiraar.
18 avar Raajaakkaludaiya Kattugalai Avizhththu, Avargal Iduppugalaik Kachchaikattugiraar.
19 avar Mandhirigalai Siraipidiththukkondupoi, Belavaangalaik Kavizhththuppodugiraar.
20 avar Nambikkaiyullavargaludaiya Vaakkai Vilakki, Mudhirvayadhullavargalin Aalosanaiyai Vaangippodugiraar.
21 avar Prabukkalinmel Igazhchchi Varappannugiraar; Balavaangalin Kachchaiyaith Thalarndhupogappannugiraar.
22 avar Andhagaaraththilirukkira Aazhangalai Veliyarangamaakki, Marana Irulai Velichchaththil Konduvarugiraar.
23 avar Jaadhigalaip Perugavum Azhiyavum Pannugiraar; Avar Jaadhigalaip Paravavum Kurugavum Pannugiraar.
24 avar Boomiyilulla Janaththinudaiya Adhipadhigalin Nenjai Agatrippottu, Avargalai Vazhiyillaadha Andharaththile Alaiyappannugiraar.
25 avargal Velichchamatra Irulile Thadaviththirigiraargal; Veriththavargalaippola Avargalaith Thadumaariththiriyappannugiraar.
